page.title: 14Transport in Twyford
page.content: {Public Transport:}Twford and Pounden have a reasonable bus service for shoppers and workers.{Monday to {Saturday}-4 buses to Bicester and 4 to Aylesbury.One bus to Oxford. {Tuesdays only -one bus to Milton Keynes and one to Buckingham. {Works Buses}Twyford and Pounden,Monday to Friday one daily to:Calvert Brick Works,Wipac Factory in Buckingham,and to Arncott and Westcott MOD Establishments. {School Buses}Twyford and Pounden one each schoolday to:Grendon Underwood Combined School,Winslow Secondary, Buckingham Secondary,Waddesdon Secondary and the Royal Latin Grammar in Buckingham. 87% of households have at least one car.6% of adults own a motor-cycle and 5% of the working population own a bicycle for travelling to work.
